Were open to any collaboration, really looking for people with skills to be helping out with advancing the technology to become more effecient and reusable for other content.

@kopykat:
Any ideas for videorama that you could help with?
Are you into python programming for backend stuff, like seeder,leecher per file, visualizing p2p assembly of first time downloading, etc.?

As for video publicizing, it is independent of webtorrent, it routes, stores and loads every video through zeronet, so no accidental leakage of IP while using tor.
